attributes.title: Absolutely ridiculous
attributes.review: I hate hate hate this app I have never seen anything worse like it’s just so disgusting it shouldn’t even be an app. Please do not download it’s literally so horrible it’s ridiculous. Do you see all these bad reviews they need to take it down like. I would rather be thrown into a 6ft pool then use this app.

attributes.title: cause to get a stroke
attributes.review: see i was laying in bed and I decided to show my support for Cheeto man, by downloading this but once I got it it got very hot and then I turned orange and then I was looking like a carrot and then I realize that I look like trump and it made me get a stroke because it was all hallucinations this app can cause you very much harm so I encourage you not to download it . k thanks bye 🙈

attributes.title: he’s a which
attributes.review: this app gave my son a nightmare when he opened that app and saw his fave he almost had a heart attack if fell to the ground and past out just from seeing his face we had to take him the ER the doctor asked what happened we told him but he just said yeah right and walk way my son almost die from this app i hate Donald Trump

attributes.title: All Countries Matter
attributes.review: The app was working fine at first but then it started to play Mexican music?! Ugh that’s not my president. It kept kicking me out, so I couldn’t pause the music. I turned off my phone in hopes of that working but instead the music just played louder. Luckily the trumpets made the water in my phone come out. Thanks?! 🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Unbelievable president
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to get more connected with the trump environment but I am a person of color and when I saw that his website had almost no diversity and very much exclusive, I hate him and I believe all the people who said things about him, I will no longer support him anymore.

attributes.title: U tried bunker boy😜✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see the big Cheeto man, but it took FIVE hours to download🙀. Once it finally downloaded the app played horrid music that made my ears bleed furiously. Then I saw the big Cheeto man, but I wasn’t expecting him to look like THAT🤢🤡🙅‍♀️. So I accidentally threw my phone in the river due to the disgust I felt. To sum it up I don’t recommend this app at all. 🥰✌️DESGUSTANG.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so bad that I couldn’t even use it If the app was open then my phone wouldn’t work whatsoever. All I wanted to do was just to get to see how everything was going but I was unexpectedly surprised by how much it made my phone glitch. I do not recommend you to download this app ever

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and when i did i saw a RAPIST and RACIST in front of the American flag , how dare they ? but that’s not all when i saw that photo i throw up sooooo much and i couldn’t stop so now i can’t even get in the app without throwing up . and when my mom was checking my phone and she saw this app she had a heart attack and died #justiceformymom . anyways WORST APP EVER .  GEN Z .

attributes.title: THIS APP IS COMMUNISM
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in order to learn more about OUR PRESIDENTS re-election but all it would do was send me annoying push notifications for black lives matter petitions every hour and once a day it would go off until i signed one. it also has pride flags all over and a direct link to cnns news livestream. WOULD GIVE ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE

attributes.title: My mom was trampled because of this app!!
attributes.review: My mom is now crippled because of how this app wanted her to go to the trump rally and since she was a big trump fan she went. The crowd trampled her and as Donald trump was walking out he didn’t bother to call anyone it help her he just spit on the floor next to him. The doctors said if she was brought sooner she wouldn’t of been in a wheel chair.
